message: Let's split the money, Bob. I think this is a fair offer considering the inflation working against you.
I'll take 51 dollars, and you can have 49.  It's a fair split given the inflation rate and I think it's a good start to our negotiation.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again. I'll take a little less this time, but I need you to meet me halfway. This deal still favors you considering the inflation.
